findings.details: Added tighter mobile typography defaults for post content to improve legibility without overflow.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked due to offline audit.
Prefetch for /share/ added on homepage to speed navigation to key CTA content.
Recent news posts remain active; no placeholder content detected in the latest batch.

recommendations: Consider adding a lightweight lazy-load fade for post images to reduce perceived layout shift.
When network is available, run a live link checker to validate external news sources.
